channel.title: Wyam.io on Lou Rainaldi
channel.description: Recent content in Wyam.io on Lou Rainaldi

item.title: Welcome to My New Blog (blog.rainaldi.dev)
item.description: UPDATED: March 10, 2019 Welcome to my new blog! I have had many different sites over the years. Recently, a few months ago I decided to shut them down. I was not updating them as much and focusing to much on maintaining and updating the site. With family and work I am very busy like many of you. A friend introduced me to Wyam.io which is a static site generator and hosting using Azure Blob Storage.
